hero.title: About PersonaTests ‚ú®
hero.subtitle: Discover the story behind the world's most engaging personality testing platform

mission.title: Our Mission üéØ
mission.paragraph1: At PersonaTests, we believe that understanding your personality is the key to unlocking your potential. Our mission is to make scientifically-backed personality assessments accessible, engaging, and genuinely helpful for people worldwide.
mission.paragraph2: We've taken the complex world of psychological research and transformed it into fun, interactive experiences that provide real insights into who you are, how you think, and what makes you unique.

scientific.title: üî¨ Scientific Foundation
scientific.description: Our tests are built on decades of psychological research, including validated frameworks like the Big Five model, Myers-Briggs Type Indicator principles, and emotional intelligence theories.

modern.title: ‚ö° Modern Experience
modern.description: We've reimagined personality testing for the digital age with engaging interfaces, instant results, and social sharing capabilities that make self-discovery fun.

privacy.title: üîí Privacy First
privacy.description: Your personality data belongs to you. We never sell your information, and our tests can be taken anonymously with results shared only at your discretion.

global.title: üåç Global Accessibility
global.description: Available in 9+ languages with cultural adaptations, our tests work across devices and are designed to be inclusive and accessible to everyone.

tests.title: Our Test Collection üìö
tests.description: We offer a comprehensive suite of personality assessments, each designed to reveal different aspects of your psychological profile:

types.title: 16 Personality Types
types.description: Based on Carl Jung's psychological types and the Myers-Briggs framework

bigfive.title: Big Five Personality
bigfive.description: The gold standard in personality psychology with decades of research validation

emotional.title: Emotional Intelligence
emotional.description: Measure your ability to understand and manage emotions effectively

specialized.title: Specialized Assessments
specialized.description: DISC, conflict styles, strengths assessment, and relationship compatibility

quality.title: Quality & Accuracy üéØ
quality.frameworks: Validated Frameworks: All our tests are based on peer-reviewed psychological research and established personality models
quality.improvement: Continuous Improvement: We regularly update our assessments based on the latest findings in personality psychology
quality.reliability: Statistical Reliability: Our tests undergo rigorous statistical analysis to ensure consistent and meaningful results
quality.cultural: Cultural Adaptation: Questions and interpretations are adapted for different cultural contexts and languages
quality.ethical: Ethical Standards: We follow APA guidelines for psychological testing and maintain strict ethical standards

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.description: Your data security is our top priority

community.title: Join Our Community ü§ù
community.question: Ready to Discover Your Personality?
community.description: Join millions of people who have already discovered their unique personality insights with PersonaTests.

footer.copyright: ¬© 2025 PersonaTests. All rights reserved. Made with ‚ú® for discovering your true personality.

delete.question: How do I delete my account and data?
delete.answer: Email privacy@personatests.com with your account email address. We'll delete all your data within 30 days as required by GDPR and CCPA.

accurate.question: Are your personality tests accurate?
accurate.answer: Our tests are based on established psychological frameworks but are for entertainment and self-reflection only. They're not professional psychological assessments.

employment.question: Can I use test results for employment decisions?
employment.answer: No. Our tests are for entertainment only and should never be used for medical, employment, or legal decisions. Only licensed professionals can provide such assessments.

premium.question: How do premium reports work?
premium.answer: Premium reports ($2.99) provide detailed insights and are delivered via email within 24 hours. All payments are securely processed through Stripe.

disclaimer.intro: ALL TESTS ARE FOR ENTERTAINMENT AND SELF-REFLECTION PURPOSES ONLY. Our assessments are NOT:
disclaimer.notSubstitute: Substitute for licensed mental health care
disclaimer.notEmployment: Appropriate for employment or legal decisions
disclaimer.mentalHealth: Mental Health Disclaimer: Tests related to mental health topics (anxiety, depression, ADHD-like symptoms) are purely for fun and cannot diagnose any condition. Only licensed healthcare professionals can provide mental health diagnoses.
